00027     QString const API_TYPE_NAMES[] = 
00028     {
00029         "Upper-level (provider)",
00030         "Lower-level (requester)"
00031     };
00032 }

00034 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 // Function: APIEditor()
00036 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00037 APIEditor::APIEditor(LibraryInterface* libHandler, QSharedPointer<Component> component, 
00038                      void* dataPointer, QWidget *parent) : ItemEditor(component, parent),
00039                                                            api_(static_cast<BusInterface*>(dataPointer)),
00040                                                            nameGroup_(this, tr("Name and description")),
00041                                                            attributes_(this),
00042                                                            busType_(VLNV::BUSDEFINITION, libHandler, this, this),
00043                                                            apiTypeGroup_(tr("API type"), this),
00044                                                            libHandler_(libHandler)
00045 {
00046     Q_ASSERT_X(component, "APIEditor constructor",
00047         "Null Component-pointer given as parameter");
00048     Q_ASSERT_X(dataPointer, "APIEditor constructor",
00049         "Null dataPointer given as parameter");
00050 
00051     QVBoxLayout* typeLayout = new QVBoxLayout(&apiTypeGroup_);
00052 
00053     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < API_TYPE_COUNT; ++i)
00054     {
00055         apiTypeButtons_[i] = new QRadioButton(tr(API_TYPE_NAMES[i].toStdString().c_str()), &apiTypeGroup_);
00056         typeLayout->addWidget(apiTypeButtons_[i]);
00057     }
00058 
00059     apiTypeButtons_[0]->setChecked(true);
00060 
00061     connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00062         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00063     connect(&nameGroup_, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)),
00064         this, SIGNAL(nameChanged(const QString&)), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00065     connect(&attributes_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00066         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00067     connect(&busType_, SIGNAL(contentChanged()),
00068         this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()), Qt::UniqueConnection);
00069     connect(apiTypeButtons_[API_TYPE_UPPER], SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00070     connect(apiTypeButtons_[API_TYPE_LOWER], SIGNAL(clicked(bool)), this, SIGNAL(contentChanged()));
00071     
00072     busType_.setTitle(tr("API definition"));
00073     
00074     // create the layout of the general tab
00075     QGridLayout* layout = new QGridLayout(this);
00076     layout->addWidget(&nameGroup_, 0, 0, 1, 1);
00077     layout->addWidget(&attributes_, 0, 1, 3, 1);
00078     layout->addWidget(&busType_, 1, 0, 1, 1);
00079     layout->addWidget(&apiTypeGroup_, 2, 0, 1, 1);
00080     layout->setRowStretch(3, 1);
00081 
00082     restoreChanges();
00083 }

00087 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00088 APIEditor::~APIEditor()
00089 {
00090 }
00091 
00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 // Function: isValid()
00094 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00095 bool APIEditor::isValid() const
00096 {
00097     if (!nameGroup_.isValid())
00098         return false;
00099     else if (!attributes_.isValid())
00100         return false;
00101     else if (!busType_.isValid())
00102         return false;
00103     // if specified bus type does not exist
00104     else if (!libHandler_->contains(busType_.getVLNV()))
00105         return false;
00106 
00107     // all was fine
00108     return true;
00109 }
00110 
00111 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00112 // Function: removeModel()
00113 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00114 void APIEditor::removeModel()
00115 {
00116     component()->removeBusInterface(api_);
00117 }
00118 
00119 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00120 // Function: makeChanges()
00121 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00122 void APIEditor::makeChanges()
00123 {
00124     if (!isValid())
00125         return;
00126 
00127     api_->setName(nameGroup_.getName());
00128     api_->setDisplayName(nameGroup_.getDisplayName());
00129     api_->setDescription(nameGroup_.getDescription());
00130     api_->setAttributes(attributes_.getAttributes());
00131     api_->setBusType(busType_.getVLNV());
00132 
00133     if (apiTypeButtons_[API_TYPE_UPPER]->isChecked())
00134     {
00135         api_->setInterfaceMode(General::MASTER);
00136     }
00137     else
00138     {
00139         api_->setInterfaceMode(General::SLAVE);
00140     }
00141 
00142     component()->updateBusInterface(api_);
00143 }
00144 
00145 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00146 // Function: restoreChanges()
00147 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00148 void APIEditor::restoreChanges()
00149 {
00150     nameGroup_.setName(api_->getName());
00151     nameGroup_.setDisplayName(api_->getDisplayName());
00152     nameGroup_.setDescription(api_->getDescription());
00153 
00154     attributes_.setAttributes(api_->getAttributes());
00155 
00156     if (api_->getBusType().isValid())
00157         busType_.setVLNV(api_->getBusType());
00158 
00159     if (api_->getInterfaceMode() == General::MASTER)
00160     {
00161         apiTypeButtons_[API_TYPE_UPPER]->setChecked(true);
00162     }
00163     else
00164     {
00165         apiTypeButtons_[API_TYPE_LOWER]->setChecked(true);
00166     }
00167 }
00168 
00169 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00170 // Function: confirmEditorChange()
00171 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00172 bool APIEditor::confirmEditorChange()
00173 {
00174     // Check if the API definition is valid but does not exist in the library.
00175     VLNV vlnv = busType_.getVLNV();
00176 
00177     if (vlnv.isValid() && !libHandler_->contains(vlnv))
00178     {
00179         // Ask the user if he wants to create a new API definition.
00180         ApiCreateDialog dlg(vlnv, this);
00181 
00182         if (dlg.exec() == QDialog::Rejected)
00183         {
00184             return false;
00185         }
00186 
00187         // Create a new API definition.
00188         QSharedPointer<BusDefinition> apiDef(new BusDefinition());
00189         apiDef->setVlnv(vlnv);
00190         apiDef->setType(KactusAttribute::KTS_BUSDEF_API);
00191 
00192         libHandler_->writeModelToFile(dlg.getDirectory(), apiDef);
00193     }
00194 
00195     return true;
00196 }
